t: To add sticky notes, you don't need the library. Right-click on the table or point somewhere and press [n].
When you are done, switch to table #5.
You can also multi-select items in your library - even across tabs - to add them at once.

Now it's time to add your own pieces to the small dungeon below.

How about adding an Orc and a treasure chest?

All the items in the library are sorted in Tiles, Overlay, Tokens and Dice tabs.

Look for the Orc in the Token tab.
Open the library: Use Right-click -> 'Add piece' on the table or press [l]. Select the chest and click 'Add'.
